transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello good evening sir

Executive: Good evening good evening tell me

Customer: Good evening tell me sir call me sir

Executive: Tell me sir

Executive: You only sir call me you only tell me

Executive: That is sorry for the refund you have raised ticket right

Customer: Yes sir ticket raised

Executive: That ticket is just a concern that's it

Customer: Sorry sir I can't hear you voice is not clear sir

Executive: Can you hear me now

Customer: Speak little louder sir

Executive: Okay okay fine sorry sorry that is the ticket concern is not there

Customer: Sorry sir voice is breaking

Executive: Can you hear me now

Customer: Yes I can hear you sir

Executive: Okay fine that is you have raised the concern right you need refund

Customer: Yes sir

Executive: Refund is not possible

Customer: Is it sir

Executive: Yes sir service wise we can provide best service you use daily basis as we say you use two minutes daily

Customer: Sir I don't have time sir timing is not apt for me sir I go to work and I have work at home so I don't have time to open IndiaMART and speak it is uncomfortable for me we will be free in afternoon lunch time but customer is not picking up the call at that time

Customer: I have tried it sir

Executive: You focus on buyleads rather than calls buyer will call you directly

Customer: Yes sir we are not getting that much calls

Executive: Okay you are not getting calls you can follow up through mail

Customer: I can't hear you

Executive: Mail is there right

Customer: Yes sir I am following up through mail

Executive: You are approaching through buyleads it is primary you are taking

Customer: Yes sir if we don't take buyleads then amount is waste if we don't take buyleads then it is a loss

Executive: I am saying you have informed that you don't have time

Customer: Yes sir

Executive: For that reason you use buyleads as secondary tool mail and calls you use as primary tool

Customer: No sir we can use it in any way we can use buyleads we can use everything mainly

Customer: My issue is I am going to work that is why I can't manage both another thing is I have stopped the business now

Customer: I am not continuing sir sorry sir

Executive: GST is active

Customer: GST is active but we have stopped the business 10 days before we have not deactivated GST I am going to job so my husband is thinking to do another business with that GST number so clothing business is stopped now

Executive: Okay

Customer: We have lost something if you add another business it will be good your husband is running business right

Customer: Yes sir but we have not started now we have financial problem personally

Customer: I am going to job because of that if I get regular orders in IndiaMART then I will know

Executive: You have got 8 to 6 orders

Customer: We have joined IndiaMART 4 months before we are getting less orders

Executive: First thing what is the plan what is the visibility it is running right

Customer: No sir you are saying everything is okay I am not saying IndiaMART is not satisfied leads are coming enquiry is coming but we can't continue we can't continue that is why I am asking for refund I have talked to Rithika mam I have talked harshly to her I felt bad I have talked harshly to her

Customer: After talking I felt bad she talked kindly she said do this do that she talked kindly I felt bad when I asked for refund I talked harshly I felt bad I have not said sorry I will say sorry next time I need refund please tell me something

Executive: Sorry mam there is no refund

Customer: There is no refund if we move business it is okay we are doing business if you don't give refund we can try something else but we have stopped the business it is useless

Executive: It is registered you have paid for one year subscription invoice is provided

Customer: Yes sir everything is guided

Customer: Rithika mam has provided

Executive: Okay

Customer: If you have said that refund option is for two months then I would have said

Executive: There is no refund option

Customer: Someone said when they were talking sir

Executive: If there is no response

Customer: Okay

Executive: If there is no response then it will be initiated it is one week process

Customer: Okay sir

Executive: Someone has communicated it is not two months

Customer: Everyone is talking differently every time when someone is talking you are saying something else if I say what you are saying they are saying it is not like that if I say what they are saying you are saying it is not like that

Executive: I am saying openly if anyone talks there is no refund

Customer: Is it sir

Customer: What is there for us

Executive: Service wise we can provide best service daily basis

Customer: Leads are coming I don't have any issue with leads but it is not converting into order 1000 people are enquiring 100 people are enquiring 30 people are enquiring we are giving 30 pieces for wholesale

Customer: We are keeping them in video call we are selecting products we are sending parcels even then they are asking for one piece for sample give wholesale price for that how will it be correct

Executive: Conversion is in your side IndiaMART is giving enquiry converting into business is your side

Customer: I am saying there is no fault in your side there is fault in our side so we don't want to continue we are stopping business

Executive: Okay you are stopping business there is no refund policy I am communicating this for so long

Customer: If you don't refund then what kind of service you will provide

Executive: Service is normal monthly video meet will be conducted

Customer: As usual you will do

Executive: We can do best service how are you expecting first thing how much supplying capacity is there according to that lead enquiry will be promoted based on listing

Executive: I am doing service proactively here what systematic AI is there that is our company how much investment is done how much supplying capacity is there according to that it will be listed out

Customer: Okay sir

Executive: This is what I am saying

Customer: Okay sir

Customer: If I have to talk to someone else tell me I will talk and ask for refund

Executive: I am manager of Rithika

Customer: Is it you don't have higher officer

Executive: I am calling you as manager

Customer: If you give refund it will be beneficial for me

Executive: It is not possible if it was possible I would have said customer satisfaction is important

Executive: That is why I am saying

Customer: Next I will continue sir now I am discontinuing after financial problem we will continue business

Customer: Please help me as a sister I have personal issue if you are a lady I would have said openly

Customer: You are a manager I can't say anything openly I have said to Rithika I have said personal issue I don't know what to do if I run business it is okay I have stopped business clothing business is stopped

Executive: You will start from scratch

Customer: Yes sir situation is like that

Executive: I have said there is no possibility I have conveyed you start from first

Customer: I have raised ticket you have not replied anything

Executive: You have raised ticket I can't understand I am calling you now it is a concern that is why I am calling you if you raise ticket I will call you same conversation will be communicated

Customer: Okay sir

Executive: Okay

Customer: Refund is not there

Executive: Refund is not there

Customer: I am trying so much at least one month I will move after that can you give refund

Executive: It is not possible you are asking so much it is not necessary if it was there I would have not kept it

Customer: I have stopped business that is why I am asking

Executive: Sorry there is no refund

Customer: Okay sir I will talk to my husband and update Rithika mam

Executive: I will close the concern feedback will come

Customer: Okay sir

Executive: Okay sir thank you

Customer: Okay sir thank you sir thank you so much
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the IndiaMART subscription.

- Difficulty managing IndiaMART due to work.

- Business has been stopped recently.



Resolution:

- Explained that a refund is not possible.

- Suggested focusing on mail and call enquiries.

- Explained service will continue as usual.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with her husband.

- Customer will update Rithika mam.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, business
